name: paillard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dish in which a piece of meat is hit or pressed to make it thin and flat before it is cooked : Slice the chicken breasts into steaks and flatten them into very thin paillards. They had never tried a paillard. Compare
escalope
schnitzel
More examplesFewer examplesTo make paillards, use boneless, skinless chicken breasts, turkey or veal cutlets, or boneless pork loin chops.

relating to or in the style of a dish in which a piece of meat is hit or pressed to make it thin and flat before it is cooked : I ordered chicken paillard. Serve each chicken thigh with a grilled breast paillard.
More examplesFewer examplesThey chatted over greens and chicken paillard.We tried the spicy potato and chicken paillard salad.
